ISSUE.TITLE: Not working with Django 4.0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## ENVIRONMENT ``` OS and Version: Windows 11 Python Version: 3.9.5 MobSF Version: 3.4 beta ``` ## EXPLANATION OF THE ISSUE *What happens:* There are some errors during the **setup** phase (I have all the requirements correctly installed) and when running it breaks with the error: ``` ImportError at / cannot import name 'url' from 'django.conf.urls ``` After some research, I found out that **just today** *Django 4.0* has been released. Probably they changed something and your code broke. In fact, changing the Django version in the **requirements.txt** file to ``` django==3.15 (instead of django>=3.1.5) ``` solves the problem. ## STEPS TO REPRODUCE THE ISSUE ``` 1. clone the repo (git clone https://github.com/MobSF/Mobile-Security-Framework-MobSF) 2. Run the setup script (setup.bat) 3. Run MobSF (run.bat 127.0.0.1 <port_number>) ``` ## LOG FILE Unfortunately I do not have the log file because I deleted the old venv (the one with Django 4.0)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: HOTFIX: Check ELF and MachO before getting details
